settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
1. First, insert the batteries (usually AAA or lithium ion) into the FlameLaser.
  2. Turn on the laser by pressing the button on the side of the pointer. Make sure to point the laser away from yourself and others before turning it on.
  3. Adjust the focus of the laser beam by rotating the focus ring located at the front of the pointer. This will allow you to control the width of the beam and make it more or less concentrated.
  4. To use the star cap, simply screw it onto the front of the laser pointer. The cap will project a pattern of stars or other shapes depending on the design.
  5. Be sure to only use the laser pointer in appropriate settings and avoid shining it at people or animals. It is important to also avoid shining the laser at airplanes, vehicles, or other moving objects.
  6. When you're finished using the laser pointer, turn it off and store it in a safe place out of reach of children and pets.

Remember, the laser pointer can cause damage to your eyes or others' eyes, so use it responsibly and with caution.

settings.text_1: Love the FlameLaser! Bright and high-quality with a rechargeable battery and convenient clip. Highly recommended!
settings.text_2: I've tried many different laser brands, but the FlameLaser is by far the best one I've ever used. It's incredibly bright and has a long battery life. The quality is top-notch, and it's great for both professional and personal use.
settings.text_3: "Saw FlameLaser on tiktok and let me tell you, it's insane. The brightness is no joke and the rechargeable battery is a nice touch. Definitely recommend it if you're in the market for a powerful laser."

settings.heading: Flammable objects
settings.row_content: For your safety, please exercise caution when using the FlameLaser pointer as it is capable of burning objects. Avoid using it near flammable materials such as paper or fabric, and always be aware of your surroundings to prevent any potential harm.

settings.heading: Protect eyes
settings.row_content: To prevent any harm, we strongly recommend wearing protective eyewear when using the laser and refraining from aiming it directly at anyone's eyes.

settings.heading: Keep away from kids
settings.row_content: The FlameLaser pointer should be kept out of reach of children and pets. Store it in a secure location when not in use.

settings.title: Make the switch
settings.text: Flame Laser is not your ordinary Laser brand. We offer top-quality, high-performance lasers for professionals and enthusiasts. Our durable lasers provide the best value for your money.

settings.title: Exceeded my Expectations
settings.text: I purchased the FlameLaser pointer for stargazing and it exceeded my expectations! The laser is incredibly bright and the build quality is top-notch. I feel safe using it because of the warning labels and the added protective eyewear that came with the Laser Set.
settings.author: Derrick Van Holt

settings.title: Perfect for Outdoor
settings.text: The FlameLaser pointer is a great addition to my outdoor gear. It's perfect for camping and hiking trips, and the rechargeable battery makes it so convenient. I love the heroic design and the fact that it's so easy to use
settings.author: Jason Francis-Storm

settings.title: Game-Changer for Construction
settings.text: I work in construction and needed a high-power laser for my job. The FlameLaser has been a game-changer for me. It's powerful enough to use during the day and the durable design means it can withstand the rough conditions of a construction site. Highly recommend it to anyone in the industry.
settings.author: Jose Perez
